title: CHR , CHAR | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Converts a Unicode code point (including 7-bit ASCII) into the character that matches the input Unicode. If an invalid code point is specified, an error is returned.
CHAR is an alias for CHR.
The Unicode code point for which the character is returned.
The data type of the returned value is VARCHAR.
